name: Snack Fever
description:
In Snack Fever, you play as a fly attempting to escape the gaping jaws of a hungry human. You must dodge the assorted snack foods that plummet from above while maintaining your altitude to avoid being swallowed as part of the meal. Each snack that you dodge adds to your score; getting hit by three snacks or falling to the bottom of the screen will end your run.

Controls:

Start Game - 1 or S

Quit - 1+2 or Esc

Reset High Score - X

Up - Up Arrow or W

Left - Left Arrow or A

Right - Right Arrow or D

Art, Programming, and Music by Kevin Huang.
